AboutMe:
Having about 12 years of experience in software development and testing, I currently work at Microsoft on the next generation of managed compilers, programming language tools and IDE. Among other things, my job involves participation in designing of type systems, checking them for soundness and testing of correctness of their implementation.

Although I am not a professional mathematician, I hold a degree in theoretical physics, and I am very passionate about mathematics, especially about evaluation of integrals, sums and products in a closed form, foundations of mathematics, order theory, type theory and computability theory.
